data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What can the older generation learn from young people? Include specific examples in your answer."
data.answer: In my opinion, there are many things that older people can learn from young people. For example, many elderlies do not know how to use computers or software. If young adults are willing to teach their grandfathers and grandmothers how to use electronic gadgets and use them to make their lives easier, it would well help these older people improve their quality of life. For example, helping the elderly make new friends and broaden their social circles.
